#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,n,count,i;
	unsigned long long int s,e,x,y;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>s>>e>>n;
		for(i=0,count=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>x>>y;
			if((x<s&&y<=s)||(x>=e&&y>e))
			++count;
		}
		if(count==n)
		cout<<"YES";
		else
		cout<<"NO";
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
